abstract: The bank was badly hurt by a huge spike in consumer credit costs and the poor performance of its investment banking unit, which has clamored for Wall Street’s respect.
snippet: The bank was badly hurt by a huge spike in consumer credit costs and the poor performance of its investment banking unit, which has clamored for Wall Street’s respect.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America said yesterday that its third-quarter earnings dropped 32 percent, badly hurt by a huge spike in consumer credit costs and the poor performance of its investment bank unit that has clamored for Wall Street’s respect.

headline.main: Earnings Fall 32 Percent at Bank of America
headline.print_headline: Quarterly Earnings at Bank of America Drop 32%
